ygData.msgSnippet: Kind ve like how the whole argument of letting PKs cast non-offensive spells onto nonPKs is meaninglessly mixing the two types of playing? Either you re
ygData.messageBody:
Kind've like how the whole argument of letting PKs cast non-offensive spells onto nonPKs is meaninglessly mixing the two types of playing?

Either you're playing the game PK, or you're not. Its simple. Deal with it.
